document_data.name: Cragsmere
document_data.symbol: A gold mountain a silver sea over a field of purple
document_data.mainbody: House '''Cragsmere''' ({{Pronounce|crags|MEER|refs=}}) was a [[Nobility of Waterdeep|noble family]] of [[Waterdeep]], of [[Illuskan]] and [[Netherese]] descent,
document_data.Base of Operations: The family owned a villa in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]], on the southeast corner of [[Copper Street]] and [[Vondil Street]].
document_data.Members:
*[[Japhyl Cragsmere|Japhyl "the Hawk" Cragsmere]]: Patriarch of the family during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]
*[[Arven Cragsmere]]: Lady-consort to Lord Japhyl
*[[Shan Cragsmere|Shan "Lady Hawk" Cragsmere]]: The eldest daughter to Lord Japhyl and Lady Shan, heir to the family's estate
*[[Telbran Nelarn|"Raeraeth Cragsmere"]]: The founder of House Cragsmere, who faked his death and continued living in Waterdeep under the disguise of "Hurlblar Corthyn"
